definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Ask for $3600. Trade at Hang Hau MTR.
Your attention please, passenger to Hang Hau and Po Lam, please change train at this station.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，前往坑口及宝林的乘客，请系本站转车。

sentences.english: Proposals on the construction of pithead power plants in China are made in light of the experience of the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 借鉴美国的经验对我国煤矿坑口电站建设提出了建议。

sentences.english: Since passengers destined for Hang Hau or Po Lam, please wait for another train.
sentences.chinese: 前往宝琳或坑口o的乘客，请等待另一班列车。

sentences.english: After the knock-off bell, workers came up from the mining pits.
sentences.chinese: 打过下班铃后，井下的工人们就从坑口上来了。

sentences.english: The gravel-pit was very large, with grass and wild flowers round the sides at the top.
sentences.chinese: 砾石坑大极了，坑口四周长着青草和野花。

sentences.english: At suitable regions, mine mouth power plants could be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 在条件适宜地区发展坑口电站。

sentences.english: An abandoned coal mine in sub-urban of Taipei which is covered with a cabin.
sentences.chinese: 台北市信义区拇指山麓的废矿坑口，已被加盖铁皮屋。

sentences.english: Interchange station for Hang Hau or Po Lam.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以转乘往坑口或宝琳列车。

definition: Sha Tin town in New Territories, Hong Kong
Gukeng or Kukeng township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
Beigang or Peikang town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
